channel.title: Docker.com on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Docker.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Deprecation of Password Logins on CLI with Docker SSO Enforcement
item.description: The Docker team announces the deprecation of password logins on the Docker CLI when Single Sign-On (SSO) is enforced, effective September 16, 2024. Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/deprecation-of-password-logins-on-cli-with-docker-sso-enforcement/
